description: Note taker A note taking application. A port of the popular desktop application Tomboy. The new beta releases of 0.7.0+ have a lot of new features including editing support, but take care if you are syncing important notes by making local backup to the sdcard. See the website for a full list of the new features. The source code for these builds is in the trunk branch, while that for the stable versions is in the stable branch.
